Flask - micro web framework
	Jinja2 - template engine
		MarkupSafe - unicode subclass that supports HTML strings

	Werkzeug - WSGI utility library
	itsdangerous - helpers to pass trusted data to untrusted environments and back

gTTS - Google Text to Speech
	gTTS-token - calculates a token to run the Google Translate text to speech
	requests - Non-GMO HTTP library

Mechanize - stateful programmatic web browsing

SimpleCV - computer vision library
	CV - computer vision library
	NumPy - general-purpose array-processing package
	PIL - Python Imaging Library (image processing capabilities)
	pkg_resources - part of setuptools(package development process library)
	PyGame - modules designed for writing video games
	SciPy - scientific computing library

PyKeyboard - module for keyboard control
PyMouse - module for mouse control

timeout-decorator - function decorator(attribute) for timeout
